learnings.summary: Correction: Carla corrected several assumptions about her architecture, particularly around audience types (she
learnings.details: Carla corrected several assumptions about her architecture, particularly around audience types (she specified only three healthcare-focused types for this client), file formats (markdown for LMS compatibility, not HTML), and the separation of concerns between workbooks
learnings.evidence: Carla corrected several assumptions about her architecture, particularly around audience types (she specified only three healthcare-focused types for this client), file formats (markdown for LMS compatibility, not HTML), and the separation of concerns between workbooks

learnings.details:
Give feedback on the standalone sheet approach

**So:** Once this backup finishes, go duplicate those sheets/scripts to Drive and share the URLs with me, and we'll dive into the fun stuff! 

How'd the backup go? 🤞

**User:** So I need to run it manually? What is the process?

**Claude:** Ah! Right - you want it to run **automatically** without you having to remember!

## 🤖 **Making it Automatic:**

**Step 1:** Save the script file

1. 😊

## 🎯 **What You Actually Have (The Reality Check)**

**Your AI Agent Squad:**
- **Gemini** ✅ Native Google Drive/Workspace access
- **NotebookLM** ✅ Native Google Drive access  
- **Claude (me!)** ✅ Has Google Drive search tool (you're using it now!)
- **Perplexity (Penny/Pete)** ❌ No native Drive access
- **Manus** ❌ No native Drive access (but can be given context)
- **Grok** ❌ No Drive access
- **OpenAI (Fred)** ❌ No Drive access

## 🏗️ **The Original AAE Architecture (What You Were Building)**

```
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                    NOTION                           │
│  (Master Source of Truth - All Databases)          │
│  • Courses & Education                              │
│  • AI Prompts                                       │
│  • Secrets                                          │
│  • Master Organisations                             │
│  • Content Universe                                 │
└─────────────┬───────────────────────────────────────┘
              │
              ↓
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│              KNOWLEDGE LAKE (Flask/Waitress)        │
│  • API layer that queries Notion                    │
│  • Provides structured data to agents               │
│  • Running on local server                          │
└─────────────┬───────────────────────────────────────┘
              │
              ↓
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                   MCP BRIDGE                        │
│  • Model Context Protocol server                    │
│  • Lets Claude access Notion via tools              │
│  • Gives structured access to databases             │
└─────────────┬───────────────────────────────────────┘
              │
              ↓
┌─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┐
│                    mem0 FOLDER                      │
│  • Conversation memory/context                      │
│  • Exported chats for persistence                   │
│  • Backup of AI interactions                        │
└─────────────────────────────────────────────────────┘
```

## 💡 **The Insight: You Don't Need Google Drive as a Layer!**

You're absolutely right! Here's the **smarter architecture:**

### **New Flow:**
```
NOTION → mem0 (structured exports by database)
     ↓
  Knowledge Lake (API access for all agents)
     ↓
  AI Agents query the Lake for context
```

## 🔄 **The Better Sync Strategy**

### **Option 1: Notion → mem0 Direct Sync (Recommended)**

Create structured folders in mem0 that mirror your Notion structure:

```
C:\Users\carlo\Development\mem0-sync\mem0\
├── conversations\
│   ├── claude-conversations. ⏳ Review your standalone sheet approach

**We got sidetracked by the infrastructure!**

---

## 💡 **My Suggestion:**

**Right now:**
- Skip the Knowledge Lake check (it's not blocking you)
- Skip the Notion→mem0 sync setup (not urgent)
- Skip the agent scheduling (future optimization)

**Instead:**
- Share those Apps Script URLs or copy/paste the code
- Let me review the prompts Claude Code is using
- Get actionable feedback on Vertex AI integration
- Actually solve the problem you came here with! 😄

---

**So

Correction: Here are your options:

---

## 🎯 **SMART SLIDE WRITING OPTIONS**

### **Option 1: Find Last Row & A
learnings.details:
Here are your options:

---

## 🎯 **SMART SLIDE WRITING OPTIONS**

### **Option 1: Find Last Row & Append** (Safest)
- Looks at Audio tab, finds last used row
- Writes new 12 slides after existing content
- **Pros:** Never overwrites, always safe
- **Cons:** Can create duplicates if run twice

### **Option 2: Check Module # & Update or Append** (Smartest)
- Searches Audio tab Column G for existing Module Number
- If found: Updates those 12 rows
- If not found: Appends after last row
- **Pros:** No duplicates, safe updates
- **Cons:** Slightly more complex

### **Option 3: Fixed Position by Module #** (Predictable)
- Module 1 = rows 2-13
- Module 2 = rows 14-25
- Module 3 = rows 26-37, etc. getSheetId()}&range=${rangeNotation}`;
  
  return {
    startRow: startRow,
    endRow: endRow,
    rangeNotation: rangeNotation,
    linkUrl: linkUrl
  };
}
```

---

## 📋 **USER EXPERIENCE**

**First time running Module 1:**
```
✓ Module 1 not found in Audio tab
✓ Writing slides to rows 2-13
✓ Link created: Rows 2-13
```

**Running Module 1 again (maybe user updated research):**
```
✓ Module 1 found at rows 2-13
✓ Updating existing slides
✓ Link maintained: Rows 2-13
```

**Running Module 2:**
```
✓ Module 2 not found in Audio tab
✓ Writing slides to rows 14-25
✓ Link created: Rows 14-25
```

---

## ⚙️ **SETUP REQUIRED**

Add to Script Properties in Module Generator workbook:
```
MASTER_WORKBOOK_ID = [your Master Concept-to-Course spreadsheet ID]
```

---

**Does Option 2 (smart update or append) work for you?** Or would you prefer one of the other approaches?

**User:** the logic of the col C options in the Text Outputs tab is losing me - we need both assessments and role plays not either/or

**Claude:** **AH! You're absolutely right - poor explanation on my part!**

---

## ✅ **TEXT OUTPUTS TAB - CORRECTED UNDERSTANDING**

**Each module gets TWO rows:**

```
Module 1:
Row 2: Module 1 | Module Title | MCQs (10)           | [JSON with 10 questions] | timestamp | Draft
Row 3: Module 1 | Module Title | Role-Play (3)       | [JSON with 3 scenarios]  | timestamp | Draft

Module 2:
Row 4: Module 2 | Module Title | MCQs (10)           | [JSON with 10 questions] | timestamp | Draft
Row 5: Module 2 | Module Title | Role-Play (3)       | [JSON with 3 scenarios]  | timestamp | Draft
```

---

## 📊 **UPDATED TEXT OUTPUTS STRUCTURE**

```
A - Module Number          (1, 1, 2, 2, 3, 3. ---

## ✅ **CORRECTED AUDIENCE MAPPINGS**

Keep ALL the original audience types, just use your 3 for healthcare:

```javascript
const AUDIENCE_MAPPINGS = {
  // YOUR 3 HEALTHCARE TYPES
  'Healthcare Clinical': {
    requirements: 'AHPRA registration, NMBA standards compliance, clinical competency',
    standards: 'AHPRA, NMBA, NSQHS Standards, Clinical Practice Guidelines',
    tone: 'Clinical precision with evidence-based practice focus',
    setting: 'clinical practice',
    frameworks: 'NMBA Standards for Practice, NSQHS Standards',
    assessmentFramework: 'Miller\'s Pyramid (Clinical)',
    levels: ['KNOWS', 'KNOWS HOW', 'SHOWS HOW', 'DOES']
  },
  
  'Healthcare Administrative': {
    requirements: 'Healthcare operations management, administrative compliance',
    standards: 'NSQHS Standards, Healthcare operational frameworks',
    tone: 'Operational efficiency with patient safety focus',
    setting: 'healthcare administration',
    frameworks: 'NSQHS Standards, Healthcare operational frameworks',
    assessmentFramework: 'Competency Levels (Administrative)',
    levels: ['Foundational Knowledge', 'Applied Understanding', 'Demonstrated Competence', 'Expert Application']
  },
  
  'Healthcare Combined': {
    requirements: 'Clinical and administrative competency, integrated healthcare delivery',
    standards: 'AHPRA, NMBA, NSQHS Standards, Healthcare operational frameworks',
    tone: 'Balanced clinical and operational focus',
    setting: 'integrated healthcare practice',
    frameworks: 'NMBA Standards, NSQHS Standards, Operational frameworks',
    assessmentFramework: 'Integrated Competency Framework',
    levels: ['Foundation', 'Application', 'Integration', 'Excellence']
  },

  // OTHER AUDIENCE TYPES (for non-healthcare courses)
  'Healthcare Leadership': {
    requirements: 'Executive leadership, strategic governance, organizational development',
    standards: 'Healthcare governance frameworks, AHHA standards',
    tone: 'Executive strategic with system-level thinking',
    setting: 'healthcare executive leadership',
    frameworks: 'AHHA Leadership Framework, Healthcare Governance Standards',
    assessmentFramework: 'Executive Competency Levels',
    levels: ['Executive Foundation', 'Strategic Application', 'Organizational Leadership', 'System Leadership']
  },
  
  'Executive Leadership': {
    requirements: 'C-suite leadership, corporate governance, board responsibilities',
    standards: 'ASX Corporate Governance Principles, AICD standards',
    tone: 'C-suite strategic with governance focus',
    setting: 'corporate boardroom',
    frameworks: 'ASX Corporate Governance Principles, AICD Governance Standards',
    assessmentFramework: 'Executive Competency Levels',
    levels: ['Executive Foundation', 'Strategic Application', 'Organizational Leadership', 'System Leadership']
  },
  
  'Professional Development': {
    requirements: 'Professional skills, workplace competency, career development',
    standards: 'Professional development frameworks, workplace standards',
    tone: 'Professional growth with practical application',
    setting: 'professional workplace',
    frameworks: 'Professional Competency Standards, CPD frameworks',
    assessmentFramework: 'Professional Competency Levels',
    levels: ['Foundational Knowledge', 'Applied Skills', 'Professional Competence', 'Expert Practice']
  }
};
```

      method: 'manual'
    };
  }

  // No research - create brief and pause
  Logger. Complete the research using your preferred method, then paste results into the "Research Notes" column in Module Queue

### Problem: Audio sounds wrong or cuts off

**Solution:**
- Check Column B for errors (random characters, formatting issues)
- Make sure scripts are 300-450 words (not too short or too long)
- Re-generate audio for that slide

---

### Problem: I want to regenerate audio with different voice

**Solution:**
1. **Save audio files** to your Drive folder for backup

---

---

### Problem: Slides don't appear in Master Workbook

**Check:**
- Is MASTER_WORKBOOK_ID set correctly? (Contact admin)
- Did generation complete successfully?
- Check Module Content Complete tab for error messages

**Solution:**
- Contact your system administrator
- Provide module number and error message

---

### Problem: Content doesn't match my audience level

**Solution:**
1. **Archive completed modules**
   - Move to Archived Courses tab
   - Keeps Module Content Complete clean
   - Easy to find historical content

---

## Getting Help

**If you encounter technical issues:**

1. Contact system administrator with:
   - Module number
   - What you were trying to do
   - Error message (if any)
   - Screenshot of issue

**If you need training:**
- Request live walkthrough session
- Practice with one test module first
- Review user guide together

---

## Quick Reference

### Key Menu Options:

| Menu Item | What It Does |
|-----------|--------------|
| `▶️ Process "Next" Module` | Main workflow - generates full module |
| `📊 Show Module Queue Status` | See how many modules in each status |
| `⚙️ Settings` | View configuration (admin use) |

### Key Status Values:

| Status | Meaning |
|--------|---------|
| `Queued` | Planned but not started |
| `Next` | Will be processed when you click Process |
| `Content Generated` | Complete, ready for review |
| `Done` | Reviewed, uploaded to LMS, finished |
| `Error` | Something went wrong |

### Where to Find Generated Content:

| Content Type | Location |
|--------------|----------|
| Slides | Master Workbook Audio tab (via link) |
| LMS Document | Module Content Complete → Column G |
| Workbook | Module Content Complete → Column H |
| MCQs | Module Content Complete → Column I |
| Role-Plays | Module Content Complete → Column J |

---
